species.name: happiny
descriptions: Happiny’s willing to lend its precious round stone to those it’s friendly with, but if the stone isn’t returned, Happiny will cry and throw a tantrum.
In imitation of Chansey, it keeps a round stone tucked into its belly pouch and cherishes it dearly. It gets along well with children and will sometimes play house with them for fun.
It carefully carries a round, white rock that it thinks is an egg. It’s bothered by how curly its hair looks.
It carries a round, egg-shaped rock in its belly pouch and gives the rock to its friends.
It likes to carry around a small rock. It may wander around others’ feet and cause them to stumble.

abilities.name: natural-cure
abilities.effect: Cures any major status ailment upon switching out.

abilities.name: serene-grace
abilities.effect: Doubles the chance of moves' extra effects occurring.

abilities.name: friend-guard
abilities.effect: Decreases all direct damage taken by friendly Pokémon to 0.75×.
